11100101
00011111
00000000
00100000 // reg[5] = -1

00100100
00000000
00000000
00100000 // reg[4] = 1

01000010
00000000
00000000
00010000 // reg[2] = switches

00000000
00000101
00001000
01001100 // if(reg[2] == reg[0]) PC = PC + 40

00000001
00000000
00000000
00100000 // reg[1] = 0

00000011
00000000
00001000
00110000 // reg[3] = reg[2]

00000000
00000010
00001100
01001100 // if(reg[3] == reg[0]) PC = PC + 16

00000001
10000000
00000100
00110000 // reg[1] = reg[1] + reg[4]

00000011
10100000
00001100
00110000 // reg[3] = reg[3] + reg[5]

10000000
00011110
00000000
10000000 // PC = PC - 12

00000100
00000000
00000100
00110000 // reg[4]=reg[1]

00000010
10100000
00001000
00110000 // reg[2] = reg[2] + reg[5]

10000000
00011011
00000000
10000000 // PC = PC - 36

00000000
00000000
00010000
10000000 // PC = PC + 0
